biotools.summary: phastSim is a Python package for efficient simulation of sequence evolution for pandemic-scale datasets. Fast sequence evolution simulation for SARS-CoV-2 phylogenies and other genomic epidemiological datasets. phastSim is available either through PyPi or by cloning this repository directly:.
